title: Wikammer?
body: <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/archive/2004/04/06/572.aspx">Channel</a> <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/archive/2004/04/09/IE_sucks.aspx">9</a> has yet another great idea posted on it.  The idea of <a href="http://channel9.msdn.com/ShowPost.aspx?PostID=2893">combining a Wiki and a programming interface</a>.  It sounds like such a good idea, I can't believe no one else has thought of it before.  I'd love to use it for the <a href="http://imagezoomer.mozdev.org/">extension</a> I wrote for the "<a title="real browser" href="http://www.mozilla.org/products/firefox" >real browser</a>".

bodyNavItems.text: 689 people who won't be voting for Bush
